description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Arc' that renders an animated elliptical arc using SVG. It includes utility functions for calculating the circumference of an arc and manages unique gradient definitions for styling. It imports React hooks and functions from the 'remotion' library.

methods.name: getCircumferenceOfArc
methods.description: Calculates the circumference of an ellipse arc based on radii rx and ry.
